meanings.definition: Fleaworts: plants of the genus Plantago, especially Plantago psyllium.
meanings.sent1: The fleaworts in the garden are known for their healing properties.
meanings.sent2: I picked some fleaworts to use in my herbal remedy.
meanings.sent3: The fleaworts whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of fleaworts, each thought a delicate bloom.
meanings.sent5: The fleaworts danced in the breeze, a graceful display of nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: Fleaworts: any plant of the genus Plantago.
meanings.sent1: She admired the variety of fleaworts growing in the field.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist studied different types of fleaworts for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid his acorns among the fleaworts.
meanings.sent4: His words spread like fleaworts, taking root in the minds of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of fleaworts, a tapestry of green and white.

meanings.definition: Fleaworts: a plant of the genus Plantago.
meanings.sent1: A single fleaworts stood tall among the grass.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully tended to each fleaworts in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit played hide-and-seek among the fleaworts.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a garden of fleaworts, each bloom representing a memory.
meanings.sent5: The forest floor was carpeted with fleaworts, a soft bed for woodland creatures.
